fields.name: LicenseType
fields.description: The license type. Possible values are 'LicenseIncluded' (price for SQL license is included) and 'BasePrice' (without SQL license price).

fields.name: SubnetId
fields.description: Resource ID of the subnet to place this instance pool in.

fields.name: VCores
fields.description: Count of vCores belonging to this instance pool.
